p: In cases of epidemics when answers are urgently required, the quality of research is usually diminished when many teams of investigators are involved in the same field [ 20]. In this setting, even senior investigators may not follow the established rules and deviation of the rules may lead in unintentional errors and occasionally in catastrophic results. Further, members of scientific societies are under pressure and feel that they have an obligation to provide answers, even when such answers are not available.
